=FAQ=

How to run the P2P Socket/Client example

-  Make sure server and client run in a different directory

-  Add the following arguments when you're behind a proxy: -Dhttp.proxyHost=[proxyserver] Dhttp.proxyPort=\[proxyport\] Djxta.proxy.user=\[proxyuser\] Djxta.proxy.password=\[proxypassword\]

Replace the text's between brackets with correct values.
